companyInfo.Competitors: Mathematica Policy Research, Abt Associates, Impaq International

jobDescription: Test Automation Engineer for American Institutes for Research to work at our Washington DC loc. Impl + dev automated test practices for web + windows apps using Visual Studio Coded UI. Design test scripts w/ C# script lang. Build + maintain test automation infrastructure for load, function + perf testing. Work w/ QA mngr to define process + strategy w/ automation. Identify, analyze, + doc problems w/ prog func, output, online screen, + content. Plan test sched + strategies w/ proj scope + deliv dates. Little domestic travel may be involved. May undergo background checks.  Must have Bachelors in Comp Sci, Math, Stats, Elec Engg or rel and 7 yrs relevant software test exp in a QA team performing white box testing, write test cases, and dev test plans and exp with test automation and devlpmnt; or a Masters in Comp Sci, Math, Stats, Elec Engg or rel and 4 yrs relevant software test exp in a QA team performing white box testing, write test cases, and dev test plans and exp with test automation and devlpmnt.  Also reqs skill (3 yrs exp) in: working with Git and JIRA; relational databases; Windows, Mac OS, Command Prompt/Batch, and Terminal/Shell operating systs; Build and maintain test harness for web apps and APIs; SOAP and REST; and JSON and XML.  Apply with complete application at www.air.org; ref. Job #10195. EOE
